termcondition2: of the provision of internet access services.
termcondition_anon2: of the provision of internet access services.
anon_pretext1: To log in your device to access the Internet, click Log In. The connection will be maintained for 12 hours of inactivity of your device.
status_pretext1: Your device is logged in and has access to the Internet. The connection will be maintained for the time determined by the network support in relation to the activity of this device.
status_pretext2: If you want to end this connection yourself, click LOG OUT.
noscript: Warning: To properly log into the system, JavaScript must be enabled.
cp_portal_tooltip_title: You do not have the code?
cp_portal_info: Internet access in the network < ISP Name > requires a username and password, or access code. Please note that the login and password should be protected by the user against loss or access by third parties.
cp_portal_cookies_note: This site uses cookies to store information on your computer. We use cookies to provide services at the highest level, including in a manner tailored to individual needs. Using the site without changing the setting of cookies is that they will be posted on your device endpoint.
cp_session_start_time: The device has logged in since:
cp_session_timeout_content:
The granted time for access to the Internet has been exhausted, so the connection has been terminated.
What can be done?
  • To continue using the Internet, you must check the possibility of extending access before or purchase additional time.
  • If you have any questions, it is worth contacting the technical support team.
cp_error_server_connection: Unable to connect to the authentication server
cp_error_info:
• You used an incorrect username or password
  • The Caps Lock key is pressed on the keyboard
  • Another device is logged on to your account
  • Your account has been suspended by the system due to incorrect operation of your device
  • Account expired or it was deleted due to lack of payment
cp_error_solution_title: Try to solve the problem using the following instructions:
cp_error_solution:
• make sure that you entered the correct user name and password (keep adequate capitalization)
  • check whether you have paid your account
  • If the problem does not fit into the above solutions, contact your network support
cp_rules_info_title: for the provision of internet access services
cp_rules_content:
1. Regulations written in plain html

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin nibh augue, suscipit a, scelerisque sed, lacinia in, mi. Cras vel lorem. Etiam pellentesque aliquet tellus. Nam congue, pede vitae dapibus aliquet, elit magna vulputate arcu, vel tempus metus leo non est. Etiam sit amet lectus quis est congue mollis. Phasellus congue lacus eget neque. cp_login_attempt_content: The system allows %s-repeat unsuccessful logins. After exceeding the number of retries, the ability to log in will be blocked for the period of %s %s.
a11y-keys_data-content:
Key combination
⇧ Shift (left)
+ ⌥ Alt (left)
+ letter

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + U
focus on the Username field

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + P
focus on the Password field

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + A
check/uncheck 'I accept the terms'

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + R
opens the terms modal

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + I
logs in the user

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + O
logs out the user

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + L
activates the language switcher
a11y-lang-keys_data-content:
Hold ⇧ Shift (left) and press the two-letter language code (ISO 639-1) simultaneously or one after the other.

Examples:
⇧ Shift + P + L → switches to Polish (pl)

⇧ Shift + E + N → switches to English (en)

⇧ Shift + D + E → switches to German (de)

⇧ Shift + F + R → switches to French (fr)

⇧ Shift + E + S → switches to Spanish (es)

⇧ Shift + I + T → switches to Italian (it)
...
polyglotLanguageSwitcher_data-content: Here you can change the portal's language version. Pressing %s on the keyboard will expand the %s field, or press Shift and the two-letter language code simultaneously or one after the other, e.g., Shift + P + L will switch to the selected translation.
fieldUsername_data-content: This field contains the access key. Pressing %s simultaneously on the keyboard will select the %s field.
fieldPassword_data-content: This field contains the access key. Pressing %s simultaneously on the keyboard will select the %s field.
login-rules_data-content: Here you confirm your agreement with the terms of Internet access service as specified in the Terms.
rules_data-content: Clicking on 'Terms' will show you the content.
cp_portal_event_undefined_data-content: Here you will find information about your device's connection.
signin_data-content: Clicking the Login button will initiate an Internet connection.
signin_anon_data-content: Clicking the Login button will initiate an Internet connection.
logoff_data-content: Clicking the Logout button will terminate the Internet connection.
